titleStmt.title: A sermon preached to the two Houses of Parliament, at their solemn meeting to praise God for his infinite mercy in the restoring of the said Houses of Parliament to their honor and freedome with so little effusion of blood: at the Abbey-Church in Westminster, Aug. 12. 1647. / By Stephen Marshall, B.D. Minister of Finchingfield in Essex.
titleStmt.author: Marshall, Stephen, 1594?-1655.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Cotes for Stephen Bowtell, at the Bible in Popeshead-Alley,

notesStmt.note: Order to print on verso of title page.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
